text: Our child started as N1 in Haven Schoolhouse Bedok North 1 month back and we observed positive changes in behaviour and skills.  The teachers and staff in this centre are all professionals. They always respond to our queries and concerns on time. We are happy and thankful towards staff and school.

Our child started as N1 in Haven Schoolhouse Bedok North last year and we observed that his social skills have improved since then. Now he is in N2 and has also learned some mandarin words, which surprise us everytime. The teachers and staff in this centre are all professionals, friendly and accomodating. They are always willing to listen to our concerns and requests. We are happy and thankful that we have found this centre for our child.

My child has flourished at Haven School house Bedok north branch since N1 and currently attending K1. The caring teacher and staff, engaging curriculum, and emphasis on holistic development make it an exceptional place for early education. Highly recommend
I was in this School and it's the best :D
